snippet: A Greek professional football player, Giorgos Katidis, received a five-match ban for giving a Nazi-style salute last month while celebrating a goal for AEK Athens.
lead_paragraph: A Greek professional football player, Giorgos Katidis, received a five-match ban for giving a Nazi-style salute last month while celebrating a goal for AEK Athens.

headline.seo: Giorgos Katidis Barred Month After Nazi-Style Salute
headline.main: Player Barred Month After Nazi-Style Salute
headline.print_headline: Player Barred Month After Nazi-Style Salute
